local.artifacts.ReplaceApplication module¶

Task to replace artifacts from source to destination folder

class local.artifacts.ReplaceApplication.ReplaceApplication(app_source=None, app_destinations=None, config_source=None, config_destinations=None)¶

Take care of replacement of binaries of applications

Parameters:self.application_replace_details (dict) – save the information of the applications to be replaced
Key source:‘str’ source folder value as str
Key destination:
 ‘str’ path of destination folder(s) value as list
Key status:‘str’ save replacement status of artifacts value as bool

self.application_replace_details = {AppName : {source: ‘path’,destination: [list of folder],status: True/False}}

Return type:str

Return type:bool
replace_artifact()¶

Replace (delete old and copy latest) artifacts from downloads to actual location and update the status for success or failure

local.artifacts.UpdateConfigFile module¶

Update/modify controller config xml files

class local.artifacts.UpdateConfigFile.UpdateConfigFile(file_name, file_path, xml_attributes)¶

This is a class manage all type of update and modification that would be required in an xml file(s)

Task such as adding removing xml tag, attributes and etc.

Be careful with extending the functionality, and if implementing any action on xml, be cautious and test thoroughly as it can lead to setup issues, and hard to trace root cause.

Parameters:
  • file_name (str) – xml file name
  • file_path (str) – file path of xml
  • xml_attributes (dict) – store xml attributes and properties as key value
  • xml (XmlParser) – xml handler
update_xml_config()¶

Update xml attribute and property
